data.name: Power Herb
data.summary: Held: Both turns of a two-turn charge move happen at once. Consumed upon use.
data.description: Held: Whenever the holder uses a move that requires a turn to charge first (Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Razor Wind, Skull Bash, Sky Attack, or Solarbeam), this item is consumed and the charge is skipped.  Skull Bash still provides a Defense boost.
